title: IConvertSolidFeatureData.OverrideDefaultSheetMetalParameters
description: Gets or sets whether to override the default sheet metal parameters such as sheet thickness and default bend radius for this convert solid feature.
returns: True to override the default sheet metal parameters, false to not
remarks:
If this property is set to true, you can set:
IConvertSolidFeatureData::SheetThickness
IConvertSolidFeatureData::BendRadius
